00011 RTPAgent::RTPAgent() :
00012         mutex(0) {
00013 
00014         // =========================================================================
00015         // utwórz gniazdo RTP
00016         PRN_(1, "Creating socket for RTP...");
00017         socketfd_rtp = Net::socket_s(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
00018         VAR_(1, socketfd_rtp);
00019 
00020         PRN_(1, "Binding to address...");
00021         sockaddr_in addr_rtp;
00022         addr_rtp.sin_family = AF_INET;
00023         addr_rtp.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00024         addr_rtp.sin_port = 0;
00025 
00026         Net::bind_s(socketfd_rtp, (sockaddr *) &addr_rtp, sizeof(addr_rtp));
00027 
00028         int length = sizeof(addr_rtp);
00029         if (getsockname(socketfd_rtp, (sockaddr *) &addr_rtp, (socklen_t *) &length)
00030                         == -1) {
00031                 throw runtime_error("Can't get assigned address!");
00032         }
00033         // =========================================================================
00034         // przygotuj strukturę sockaddr_in (częściowo, reszta przy void setRemotePort, setRemoteAddress)
00035         addr_in_rtp.sin_family = AF_INET;
00036 
00037         //       ustaw localPort na port gniazda
00038         localPortRTP = ntohs(addr_rtp.sin_port);
00039         VAR_(1, inet_ntoa(addr_rtp.sin_addr));
00040         VAR_(1, localPortRTP);
00041 
00042         // =========================================================================
00043         // utwórz gniazdo RTCP
00044         PRN_(1, "Creating socket for RTCP...");
00045         socketfd_rtcp = Net::socket_s(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
00046         VAR_(1, socketfd_rtcp);
00047 
00048         PRN_(1, "Binding to address...");
00049         sockaddr_in addr_rtcp;
00050         addr_rtcp.sin_family = AF_INET;
00051         addr_rtcp.sin_addr.s_addr = addr_rtp.sin_addr.s_addr;
00052         addr_rtcp.sin_port = htons(localPortRTP + 1);
00053         Net::bind_s(socketfd_rtcp, (sockaddr *) &addr_rtcp, sizeof(addr_rtp));
00054 
00055         length = sizeof(addr_rtcp);
00056         if (getsockname(socketfd_rtcp, (sockaddr *) &addr_rtcp,
00057                         (socklen_t *) &length) == -1) {
00058                 throw runtime_error("Can't get assigned address!");
00059         }
00060 
00061         // =========================================================================
00062         // przygotuj strukturę sockaddr_in (częściowo, reszta przy void setRemotePort, setRemoteAddress)
00063         addr_in_rtcp.sin_family = AF_INET;
00064 
00065         //       ustaw localPort na port gniazda
00066         localPortRTCP = ntohs(addr_rtcp.sin_port);
00067         VAR_(1, inet_ntoa(addr_rtcp.sin_addr));
00068         VAR_(1, localPortRTCP);
00069 
00070         // =========================================================================
00071         killThread = false;
00072         pthread_create(&thread, NULL, RTPAgentReceiverThread, (void *) this);
00073         mutex.V();
00074 }
00075 
00076 RTPAgent::~RTPAgent() {
00077         mutex.P();
00078         killThread = true;
00079         mutex.V();
00080 
00081         pthread_join(thread, (void **) NULL);
00082 
00083         PRN_(1, "Closing socket...");
00084         if (close(socketfd_rtp) != 0)
00085                 throw runtime_error("Can't close socket!");
00086         PRN_(1, "OK");
00087 
00088 }

00090 void RTPAgent::setRemoteIP(string ip) {
00091         remoteIP = ip;
00092         addr_in_rtp.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(remoteIP.c_str());
00093         VAR_(1, remoteIP);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void RTPAgent::setRemotePort(int port) {
00097         remotePort = port;
00098         addr_in_rtp.sin_port = htons(remotePort);
00099         VAR_(1, remotePort);
00100 }

00102 void RTPAgent::sendPacket(RTPPacket& rtpPacket) {
00103         PRN_(3, "RTP: sendPacket");
00104         ostringstream oss;
00105         rtpPacket.toStream(oss);
00106         sendto(socketfd_rtp, oss.str().data(), oss.str().length(), 0,
00107                         (sockaddr *) &addr_in_rtp, sizeof(addr_in_rtp));
00108 
00109         PRN_(3, "-----   RTPPacket sent    -----");
00110         PRNBITS_(3, oss.str());
00111         PRN_(3, "--------------------------------");
00112 }
00113 
00114 bool RTPAgent::hasReceivedPacket() {
00115         return !incomingPackets.empty();
00116 }
00117 
00118 RTPPacket& RTPAgent::getReceivedPacket() {
00119         return *incomingPackets.popFront();
00120 }
00121 
00122 void RTPAgent::recvPacket() {
00123         static const int BUF_LENGTH = 32768;
00124         sockaddr_in sender;
00125         unsigned int senderlength;
00126         char buf[BUF_LENGTH];
00127         int length;
00128         if (0 >= (length = recvfrom(socketfd_rtp, buf, BUF_LENGTH, 0,
00129                         (sockaddr *) &sender, &senderlength))) {
00130                 return;
00131         }
00132 
00133         RTPPacket* rtpPacket;
00134         try {
00135                 rtpPacket = new RTPPacket(buf, length);
00136         } catch (DeserializationException& e) {
00137                 PRN("Received invalid data");
00138                 return;
00139         }
00140         PRN_(3, "-----  RTPPacket received  -----");
00141         PRNBITS_(3, rtpPacket->toString());
00142         PRN_(3, "--------------------------------");
00143         VAR_(3, length);
00144         incomingPackets.pushBack(rtpPacket);
00145         notifyObservers();
00146 }
00147 
00148 void* RTPAgentReceiverThread(void* rtpAgent) {
00149         RTPAgent* agent = (RTPAgent*) rtpAgent;
00150         PRN_(1, "receiver thread started");
00151         while (1) {
00152                 PRN_(9, "mutex.P");
00153                 agent->mutex.P();
00154                 agent->recvPacket();
00155                 if (agent->killThread) {
00156                         agent->mutex.V();
00157                         break;
00158                 }
00159                 PRN_(9, "mutex.V");
00160                 agent->mutex.V();
00161         }
00162         PRN_(1, "receiver thread stopped");
00163         return NULL;
00164 }
